gallery_slide.gallery_image_credit: © BAYLOR COLLEGE OF MEDICINE/PHOTO BY NADAV KANDER
gallery_slide.gallery_image_caption: The campaign that Olson created for the Texas-based Baylor College of Medicine—the first in the institution’s 70-year-history—showcased the hands of doctors. Photographer Nadav Kander was selected to shoot the black-and-white images for the print and digital campaign.

gallery_slide.gallery_image_credit: © BAYLOR COLLEGE OF MEDICINE/PHOTO BY NADAV KANDER
gallery_slide.gallery_image_caption: The campaign that Olson created for the Texas-based Baylor College of Medicine—the first in the institution’s 70-year-history—showcased the hands of doctors. Photographer Nadav Kander was selected to shoot the black-and-white images for the print and digital campaign.
From a campaign Olson created for the Alzheimer’s Association, with celebrity portraiture by Patrick Ecclesine.
